rukus.text: 26|123|krom robsa a d ban bdeseth nung banda anakneasar .
26|124|nowpel hou t del chea bangobaaun robsa puokke ban pol tow  kan puokke tha  tae puok anak min kaotakhlach a l laoh te ryy
26|125|pitabrakd nasa  khnhom kuchea anakneasar mneak da smaohtrang  samreab puok anak .
26|126|dau che  neah  chaur puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh  ning brate b tde tam  khnhom choh .
26|127|khnhom min snae r som pi puok anak nouv kamrei namuoy champoh kar ampeav  neav noh laey .  te phalbony nei kar ampeavneav robsakhnhom  ku now leu  mcheasa del krobkrong piphp teangoasa .
26|128|tae puok anak sangosang akar skoemoskai now krob tikanleng del  khpasa daembi chea kar lengsaech ryy
26|129|haey tae puok anak sangosang banda vimean da braneit nih puok  anak sangkhumthanung meanchivit amt ryy
26|130|haey nowpel puok anak ban veay thveubeab( norna mneak)  puok anak ban veay thveubeab daoy prohaenkaongkach .
26|131|dau che  neah  chaur puok anak kaotakhlach a l laoh  ning brate b tde tam  khnhom choh .
26|132|haey chaur puok anak kaotakhlach champoh anak del ban bratan  aoy puok anak nouv avei del puok anakdoeng .
26|133|trong ban bratan aoy puok anak nouv satvapahn ning kaunchaw .
26|134|ning banda suonutyean  haeyning braphp tuk cheachraen .
26|135|pitabrakd nasa  khnhom khlach puok anak ttuolorng nouv tearounakamm  now thngai da thomtheng( thngai barlok)  .
26|136|puokke ban tb tha  ku smaekna te samreab puok yeung tohbei  chea anak ban dasatuen  ryy minmen chea anak dasatuen( puok yeung)  kadaoy .
26|137|( sasanea robsa puok yeung) nih kmeanoavei krawpi sasanea  robsa anak chomnean moun noh laey .
26|138|haey puok yeung ka minmen chea anak del trauv kedeak  tearounakamm noh der .

26|139|dau che  neah  puokke ban bdeseth nung ke( hou t)  haey yeung  kaban bamphlanh puokke aoy vineasa a nd reay .  pitabrakd nasa nowknong  pru tde kar noh kuchea phosdo tang muoy da chbasaleasa .  te puokke pheak  chraen ku kmean chomnue laey .
26|140|haey pitabrakd nasa  mcheasa robsa anak kuchea mcheasa mha khlangpouke  mha anet sraleanh .
